identity.name: PlagiarismControl
identity.description: A forensic tool for academic integrity. It doesn't judge; it reveals. The design should feel like a high-end laboratory instrument—clean, sterile, and incredibly precise.

usage.h1: font-mono font-semibold text-4xl tracking-tight text-slate-900 dark:text-slate-50
usage.h2: font-mono font-medium text-2xl tracking-tight text-slate-800 dark:text-slate-100
usage.code: font-code text-sm bg-slate-100 dark:bg-slate-800 p-1 rounded
usage.label: font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-widest text-slate-500

areas.stats: col-span-full md:col-span-12 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4
areas.detail_view: col-span-full md:col-span-8 h-[calc(100vh-200px)] overflow-y-auto border-l border-slate-200 pl-6

landing_page.name: The Tetris Grid
landing_page.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-12

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-900 text-white hover:bg-indigo-800 rounded-none px-6 py-3 font-mono text-sm uppercase tracking-wider transition-all shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:shadow-none hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px]
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border-2 border-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-none px-6 py-3 font-mono text-sm uppercase tracking-wider transition-all shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,0.2)] hover:shadow-none hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px]
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-indigo-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded px-4 py-2 font-sans font-medium

cards.base: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.stat: flex flex-col justify-between h-32 border-l-4 border-indigo-900 bg-slate-50 p-4

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-slate-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-900 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 font-mono

diff_viewer.container: font-code text-sm border border-slate-200 rounded-lg overflow-hidden
diff_viewer.line_number: select-none text-slate-400 text-right pr-4 border-r border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 w-12 inline-block

hero_image.usage: Landing page hero section, right side

auth_background.usage: Background for login/signup pages with a heavy dark overlay (bg-slate-900/90)

empty_state.usage: Empty state for dashboard when no files are uploaded

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text or backgrounds unless specified.
Use 'Manrope' for all UI text and 'Azeret Mono' for all headings.
All interactive elements must have a 'data-testid'.
Ensure all charts are accessible to color-blind users (use patterns or high contrast).
The 'Upload' area should feel tactile—use dashed borders and hover states.
Code diffs must be monospaced and clearly color-coded.
Avoid 'cute' illustrations. Keep it professional and academic.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a serious academic tool. Focus on data density and clarity. The 'Control Room' layout is key—users need to see the big picture and the details simultaneously. Use the provided image URLs for the landing and auth pages. Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the main dashboard. Ensure the diff viewer is robust and easy to read.
